channel.title: buy one sappire stone
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "buy one sappire stone" - i buy one sappire stone,three brass wiring and after that one sham rock

item.title: Re: buy one sappire stone
item.content:encoded: i dont need dark water now sorry if you hae other thing or trade you welcome

item.title: Re: buy one sappire stone
item.content:encoded: I'll gladly trade you a Sham Rock for, say, a golden potion? I can also add a Dark Water.

item.title: Re: buy one sappire stone
item.content:encoded: sharpening stones aren't tradeable either, only ash-covered gems that turn into sharpening stones can be trades. also i have 9 brass wires but when i go to put them in the storehouse they say they are untradeable. so like Jolan said. only the sham rock is tradeable.

item.title: Re: buy one sappire stone
item.content:encoded: opps i mean Sharpening Stone and offer if you want and the brass it tradeable

item.title: Re: buy one sappire stone
item.content:encoded: Only the sham rock's tradeable, and what's a sapphire stone? No such item in the game.
